title: Global Illumination in C++
description: Crafted a Monte Carlo ray tracer in C++ that simulates realistic global illumination featuring transparent, reflective, and Lambertian surfaces.

title: Procedural Planet in THREE.js
description: Created a procedurally generated planet using noise to generate terrain, clouds, and stars in THREE.js. Try it here: procedural-planet.vercel.app

title: Web App for Selecting Courses
description: Developed a web app for selecting master's courses as a Bachelor's thesis. Created with React.js and Google Firebase for user management and database. Explore: litheval.vercel.app

title: Animated Short in Blender
description: Produced an animated short film from scratch in Blender, where responsibilities included animation, lighting, and props. Watch the short film: youtube.com/animated-short

title: Singing Web Game in P5.js
description: Developed a singing game using the JavaScript library p5.js, where you have to collect candies by using your voice. Primarily managed user inputs. Explore more: itch.io/sjungande-phadderister

title: Chatbot using ML
description: Implemented a Python chatbot using TF-IDF and cosine similarity. Processes conversational datasets, extracts features, and engages in text-based conversations.

title: Curling Simulation in UE5
description: Investigated the movement of curling stones, employing Euler Approximation to simulate friction and curling effect. Developed in Unreal Engine 5.

title: The Blender Guru Donut
description: Followed The Blender Guru Donut tutorial that covers basics like modeling, texturing, and rendering in Blender. Learned how to create a detailed donut scene. Watch the final render: youtube.com/blender-render

title: Online Multiplayer Mini Golf
description: Created a web-based multiplayer golf game where players can compete against each other in real-time. The game is created with React and Google Firebase for authentication and data management. The golf game itself is built using Three.js. Check it out here: webgolf.vercel.app

title: Cheddar Chase: A Godot Game
description: Created a 2D, top-down pixel art platformer, built in Godot,where you play as a mouse collecting cheese while dodging enemies. Featuring custom Aseprite art, AI behavior, and original Beepbox sound and music. Try it here: itch.io/cheddar-chase
